Necrofugitive is a 2D stealth-action game set in a dark medieval world, featuring hand-drawn pixel art and dynamic lighting. Developed by Black Garden Studios, the game introduces shapeshifting mechanics and reactive enemy AI, offering players a blend of combat and stealth as they navigate a kingdom in turmoil.

Gameplay and Visuals

Players control a cultist of Skoroz, gaining access to a variety of shapeshifting abilities. The action is presented in a side-scrolling format, with intricate pixel art representing both environments and char
title: Necrofugitive Pre-Alpha Gameplay Reveals Stealth Action

Rekindled Trails is a cozy adventure management game developed by Kiwick, now available for PC. Players explore the lost lands of Aurteris, gathering resources, managing inventory, and assisting the mysterious Flame to restore hope and rebuild villages.

Gameplay and Visuals

The game features a vibrant, dynamic world filled with diverse biomes, including shadowy mines, enchanted forests, and desolate deserts. Players use tools such as a fishing rod, pickaxe, and gloves to collect essential resources like fish, minerals, and roo
title: Rekindled Trails Adventure Management Gameplay and Release Date

Hello Kitty Island Adventure introduces a major content update, bringing fresh activities, characters, and colorful locations to its vibrant world. Set on a lush tropical island, the update showcases returning favorites and new ways to explore and decorate.

Gameplay and Visuals

The update features animated characters like a cat with a straw hat playing a drum, a brown animal with a ukulele, and a blue character in sunglasses. The tropical setting is filled with palm trees and vivid colors, highli
title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure Update Adds City Classics and Events
